thread.title: Excellent, a home a way from home
thread.title_full: Excellent, a home a way from home - Review of Hotel Turenne Le Marais, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: wafa a
title: Excellent, a home a way from home
text:
Loving this hotel. This is my third time I stayed in this hotel for its location and the friendly staff, the breakfast. I prefer to stay in rooms overlooking the street and that what I always get. Many thanks to everyone working at the hotel.
Room Tip: Upon arrival always check if there is water blockage in the shower or sink of the bathroom. See more room tips
